title: Jagger
description: Mari is fire. And I’m ice.She’s too damn hot to handle—wild, reckless, untouchable.We’re nothing alike. Our upbringings, our worlds, our rules—they clash at every turn.But opposites? They attract.I shouldn’t want her.She shouldn’t want me.Yet here we are, caught in a pull too strong to ignore.Until the moment she has to choose—me or her family.The easy choice is to walk away.But I don’t do easy. And I sure as hell don’t lose.She thinks she can burn us to the ground.But I’ll fight like hell to make sure we survive.Jagger (The Black Hornets MC #5) is a dark, steamy motorcycle club romance with fiery tension, forbidden love, and an antihero who refuses to let go of the only woman who sets him ablaze.
author: Savannah Rylan
